channel.title: Bare Metal Cloud Status - Incident History

item.title: [GRA2][Network] - Network equipment operation
item.description:
THIS IS A SCHEDULED EVENT Sep 28, 20:00 - 23:59 UTC

Sep 14, 19:34 UTC
Scheduled - Start time : 28/09/2022 20:00 UTC
End time : 28/09/2022 23:59 UTC

Service improvement : As part of our continuous improvement policy, we will be doing a maintenance on some network equipment.

item.title: [RBX3][Dedicated Servers] - 45B27
item.description:
Sep 16, 22:14 UTC
Identified - The altigo out of service is the root cause of this incident. The remote reboot service is still not working.
Our technicians are reviewing different options to restore the service.
We will get back to you as soon as we have more information.
Thank you for your understanding.

Sep 16, 19:34 UTC
Investigating - Start time : 16/09/2022 17:50 UTC
Service impact : Remote reboot device is temporarily unavailable
Ongoing actions : Our teams are currently working to solve the problem
